name: Check if Admin able to update a program with  Valid program Name and request body

steps.name: Given  Admin creates PUT Request with Program Name for the LMS API endpoint with valid request Body with mandatory , additional  fields.
When  Admin sends Put Request with Program name with valid endpoint
Then  Admin receives 200 OK Status code with updated value in response body.
